data.actual_result: The filter window stays open, with absolutely no animation, until manually closed
data.expected_result: As it happens in the Settings (try with a Setting that has a circle selection type, like in Voice & Video) it shows a little animation highlighting the box; in the other filters (Quick Switcher for example) it closes the window if it's a chosen option.
data.short_description: [Audit Log] Clicking on an already chosen option will not show an animation/close the selection window.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a Server where you have Audit Log permissions and open it. - Open the Filter and select Users or Servers. - Try to click on the selected option (by default it should be the first one) and observe.
